comment.body: If You were an Estonian, then I would suspect that "Quinas" is derived from Estonian word "Oinas". :-D

@Edward1290: Please keep in mind that the ZeroNet does not offer full anonymity and even a slightest breach gets spied caught and even the slightest breach will get any one of us caught. Think of ZeroNet as a nice open web application that does not have nasty advertisements.
@Edward1290: The ZeroNet spam bots will be en interesting phenomenon.
